channel.description: Recent content in sliding window on

item.title: Longest Substring of All Vowels in Order
item.description: The problem can be found here The Problem A string is considered beautiful if it satisfies the following conditions: Each of the 5 English vowels (‘a’, ’e’, ‘i’, ‘o’, ‘u’) must appear at least once in it.

item.title: Permutation in String
item.description: The problem can be found here The Problem Given two strings s1 and s2, return true if s2 contains a permutation of s1, or false otherwise.
